title: Ep. 146 - Strange Love by Ann Aguirre (PART 2)
itunes:title: Ep. 146 - Strange Love by Ann Aguirre (PART 2)
description:
Hey HBs! We're back with part 2 of Strange Love by Ann Aguirre! Beryl and Zylar have to get through the rest of The Choosing while overcoming Ryzven's egomaniacal antics at every turn! Plus, they figure out how to sex each other into oblivion and Snaps becomes a dog dad! It's so good! 
 Bonus Content: Erin tells us all about an encounter with Scuba Steve and we propose a book you need to write, Owen has made Erin more self-conscious, love languages, FREE FOR ALL!, Traditional Highlander Fingerbangings, river full of Hugh Jackman fantasies, controlled substance parties, and Erin and Melody chat pan and bisexuality as well as gender bias and pronouns and the effortless inclusivity in this book!
 Lady Loves: 
 Erin: Palm Springs the new rom-com on Hulu! And also Never Have I Ever on Netflix! 
 Melody: Put some lentils in your Chili.
 Episode Sponsor: 
 Rescue Me by Lauren Connolly! Reformed bad boy, awkward book editor, adorable rescue dog, and sexytimes in classic cars. HBs BUY THIS BOOK.
